summary: The implementation successfully addresses both REQ-31 and REQ-32. The GovernmentResources component was created with all required government website links, proper styling, and responsive design. It was integrated into App.tsx in the correct position and added to the navigation menu with smooth scrolling. All requirements from the BuildRequest have been implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Professional Tax URL changed from undefined/generic to https://mahavat.gov.in/
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified 'Professional Tax' without a URL. The implementation added a specific URL (mahavat.gov.in) that was not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Category-based color coding system with four categories (Tax, Corporate, Market, Regulatory)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest required emerald green and warm amber color scheme, but did not specify a category-based color system with blue for Market and purple for Regulatory categories.
